We learn

Together.By Doing.By Teaching.

THE CROSSROAD BETWEEN EDUCATION AND CONSULTANCY

A new way to do consultancy

About ShARE-UP

As the University of Porto's branch of the international organization ShARE, we connect students companies and NGOs, with the goal of solving real needs. ShARE-UP joins consulting and leadership skills in a think thank culture to create and become "Do Well Do Good" leaders

For the Students

Work on real-world cases, with start-ups, NGOs, high-level companies. Become an exceptional Do Well Do Good leader and, most of all, learn and share your knowledge

For the Companies

Discover a new way to do consultancy. Tap into a global ecossystem of innovation, fueled by highly trained students that are passionate about learning and helping you grow

ShARE Students

ShARE-UP members are bright students, with the potential to shape a more sustainable and inclusive world

Do Well Do Good

Through excellence and professionalism, we collaborate on solving major societal issues and on cases to transform companies

Leadership

ShARE is structured to improve the students’ ability to take initiatives and develop an entrepreneurial spirit

Global Mindset

Our members are integrated in a global network, enabling us to work with international teams to develop projects. The events we locally organize have a global impact

Knowledge Sharing

We promote discussion and critical thinking inside our organization. All our meetings and presentations are in English and we discuss many different topics

Consultancy Skills

ShARE students acquire top corporate skills through training and real life projects with start-ups, companies, and NGOs

ShARE Services

If you are a company, startup or NGO, work with our members to make you even better at it!

Booster Project
Business Launcher
Do Well Do Good
Apply for ShARE projects!
Booster Project

"Tap into fresh ideas for your business with our top students"

What is it?

The booster is a consulting project where ShARE-UP top students present solutions in order to tackle transversal business problems

What can we offer?
  • A team of 2 in-training members and a Senior project lead (Network Manager)
  • A ShARE-issued plan/ solution for your business
  • Post project follow-up
  • Presence in a networking session
What do we ask?
  • Project responsible to be available for the time period, to assist the students
  • A clear and feasible scope related to ShARE scopes - it has to be narrow enough to be solved within 2-3 months. The scope will be defined in an initial project proposal
  • Feedback at the end of the project via online form
Let's Meet!
Business Launcher

"Have an innovative idea? Take it to the next level!"

What is it?

ShARE-UP students intend to present a plan for turning an innovative idea into a viable business, by creating a model for the company first steps!

What can we offer?
  • A team of 2 in-training members and a Senior project lead (Network Manager)
  • A ShARE-issued plan/ solution for your business
  • Post project follow-up
  • Presence in a networking session
What do we ask?
  • Project responsible to be available for the time period, to assist the students
  • A clear and feasible scope related to ShARE scopes - it has to be narrow enough to be solved within 2-3 months. The scope will be defined in an initial project proposal
  • Feedback at the end of the project via online form
Let's Meet!
Do Well Do Good

"Learn how to well for you while doing good for others"

What is it?

With a simple framework with 8 principles, our clients will be guided through their social transformation. The value that the product or the service adds to society is the top priority of this type of project

What can we offer?
  • A team of 2 in-training members and a Senior project lead (Network Manager)
  • A ShARE-issued plan/ solution for your business
  • Post project follow-up
  • Presence in a networking session
What do we ask?
  • Project responsible to be available for the time period, to assist the students
  • A clear and feasible scope related to ShARE scopes - it has to be narrow enough to be solved within 2-3 months. The scope will be defined in an initial project proposal
  • Feedback at the end of the project via online form
Let's Meet!

ShARE Scopes

We are focused on strategic consulting! Take a lool at some examples of the main problem areas we tackle

Business Strategy

“Take your business to the next level”

Financial Strategy

“Add value to your finances”

Market Strategy

“Make the most of your market”

Operational Strategy

“Optimize your operations”

Business Strategy

“Take your business to the next level”

What is it?

Focuses on setting business objectives and developing the roadmap which leads to the desired goals, including all the decision-making processes needed to achieve them

Key Topics?

Business Planning Mission, vision, investment raising, partnerships, long-term growth plans, disruptors Business Modelling Value chain, resources, value enhancement, viability, business structure mapping and optimization

Example Questions
  • What should be our next step to grow?
  • How can I build an effective 5-10 year plan?
  • How can I structure my business?
  • I need investors, how can I get them?
  • How can I align the values of employees with a business transition?
  • Who are my stakeholders?
  • Am I providing and receiving the most value possible?
Financial Strategy

“Add value to your finances”

What is it?

Focuses on the financial control of the business and on investment possibilities, building the roadmap for a financially sustainable business that maximizes profit or assures break even

Key Topics?
  • Financial Health
    • Financial analysis, costs, margins, pricing, cash need, planning, company evaluation, management
  • Investment Analysis
    • Capital and asset acquisition, return on investment and evaluation, financial viability
Example Questions
  • How can I reduce costs?
  • Is it possible to be more profitable?
  • How should I price my products?
  • Is it financially viable to invest?
  • How can I become financially sustainable?
  • Is it viable to sell my company?
  • How can I better manage my finances?
  • Should I invest in more assets?
Market Strategy

“Make the most of your market”

What is it?

Covers everything related to the market and your position in it. It is the planning to strengthen and increase your value in any market and the audience’s perspective of you

Key Topics?
  • Market Evaluation
    • Market study, competition, expansion, viability
  • Marketing Strategy
    • Goal setting, targets, channels, forecasting
  • Marketing Plan
    • Communication plan, sensibilization, client reaching
Example Questions
  • How can I increase my position in the market?
  • Is there a profitable market for me?
  • Is a geographical expansion viable?
  • How can I reach the right client?
  • How can I improve social media?
  • How can I explore new market tendencies and opportunities?
  • How can I increase sales?
Operational Strategy

“Optimize your operations”

What is it?

Covers everything from process to products and even organization in order to measure, track and improve productivity and efficiency to have a more effective business

Key Topics?
  • Internal Organization
    • Structure, communication flow, manager development
  • Process Optimization
    • Logistics, process design, supply chain, digital transformation
  • Product  Analysis
    • Service and product expansion, product value creation
Example Questions
  • How can the communication/ information flow better in my organization?
  • Is there a way to improve my supply chain?
  • How can my company be more efficient?
  • What services could I add to my portfolio?
  • How to increase the value I offer my clients?
  • How can I transition to a more digital company?
  • Is there a way to improve our process?

Networks

The rest of the members work in one of these 3 different networks

Global Economy
Technology
The City
Global Economy

Network Manager

Rúben Pinto

Political Economy | Business Innovation | Social Develpment | Education | Globalization

Global Economy members will work with governmental or non-govermental organizations (NGOs), other student associations or educational companies. But they can also work with consulting or financial firms and even fintech companies

Technology

Network Manager

Rúben Araújo

IoT | AI | Cybersecurity | Communication Tech | Scientific Innovation

Technology is the broadest Network when it comes to companies it works with. It covers all companies which have technology as their differentiating factor or main product/ service

The City

Network Manager

Leonard Alves

Industry | Process | Energy | Environment | Urbanism

The city’s clients work in the industrial, hospitality or urban sectors. all the way from factories, warehouses, restaurants, hotels to mobility, logistical and everyday-product companies

ShARE Recruitment

We look for U.PORTO students, aged under 25, with 3 semesters left in Faculty.

For safety reasons and Covid-19 prevention, every thing will be conducted in virtual format!

1. Online Applications

Fill in our inscription form and get ready for tough but enjoyable process! Make sure you fill every field!

28th September to 11th October

2. Group Dynamics

This is the 2nd phase of recruitment. You will have to discuss and work with other candidates!

12th to 16th October

3. Interview

In an interview, we'll learn more about you! You'll have to send us your CV and a motivation letter before hand

19th to 22nd October

4. Final Retreat

This is the last phase! You have to make sure you are available for this very special day.

24th October

Let's learn together!

Become a ShARE member this semester
